plot: Wrapping up their trip to Florida, Vicki returns from the hospital with a sprained ankle. Tamra and Shannon go parasailing, while Gina faces her fears of murky water. On a sunset cruise, Kelly attempts to make amends with some of the women. Back home in the OC, Dr. Brian wonders if he and Kelly should live together. Gina tells her mom that she is calling off her divorce and Tamra finally gets her sons in the same room. Meanwhile, Emily and Kelly take an anger management session, in hopes that Kelly will be able to attend Vicki's upcoming engagement party.
